TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JavaScriptSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 对于 .NET Framework 4.7.2 及更高版本，请使用命名空间中的 Api 进行序列化和反序列化。

span.span: For .NET Framework 4.7.2 and later versions, use the APIs in the namespace for serialization and deserialization.

summary.span: 对于早期版本的 .NET Framework，请使用 Newtonsoft.Js。

span.span: For earlier versions of .NET Framework, use Newtonsoft.Json.

summary.span: 此类型旨在为启用了 AJAX 的应用程序提供序列化和反序列化功能。

span.span: This type was intended to provide serialization and deserialization functionality for AJAX-enabled applications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于 .NET Framework 4.7.2 和更高版本， 应使用命名空间中的 api 进行序列化和反序列化。For .NET Framework 4.7.2 and later versions, the APIs in the namespace should be used for serialization and deserialization. 对于早期版本的 .NET Framework，请使用 [Newtonsoft.Js](https://www.newtonsoft.com/json)。For earlier versions of .NET Framework, use [Newtonsoft.Json](https://www.newtonsoft.com/json). 类由异步通信层在内部使用，用于序列化和反序列化浏览器与 Web 服务器之间传递的数据。The class is used internally by the asynchronous communication layer to serialize and deserialize the data that is passed between the browser and the Web server. 您无法访问该序列化程序的实例。You cannot access that instance of the serializer. 但是，此类公开公共 API。However, this class exposes a public API. 因此，当您想要在托管代码中使用 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 时，可以使用类。Therefore, you can use the class when you want to work with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) in managed code. 若要序列化对象，请使用 方法。To serialize an object, use the method. 若要反序列化 JSON 字符串，请使用 或 方法。To deserialize a JSON string, use the or methods. 若要序列化和反序列化不受本机支持的类型 ，请使用类实现自定义转换器 。To serialize and deserialize types that are not natively supported by , implement custom converters by using the class. 然后，使用方法注册转换器 。Then register the converters by using the method. ## 托管类型与 JSON 之间的映射Mapping Between Managed Types and JSON 下表显示了用于序列化进程的托管类型和 JSON 的映射。The following table shows the mapping between managed types and JSON for the serialization process. 这些托管类型受本机支持 。These managed types are natively supported by . 从 JSON 字符串反序列化为托管类型时，将应用相同的映射。When you are deserializing from a JSON string to a managed type, the same mapping applies. 但是，反序列化可能是非对称的;并非所有可序列化托管类型都可以从 JSON 反序列化。However, deserialization can be asymmetric; not all serializable managed types can be deserialized from JSON. > [!NOTE] > 多维数组序列化为一维数组，您应将其用作平面数组。A multidimensional array is serialized as a one-dimensional array, and you should use it as a flat array. |托管类型Managed type|JSON 等效项JSON equivalent| |------------------|---------------------| | 仅) (UTF-8 编码。 (UTF-8 encoding only).|字符串String| ||字符串String| |单空字符 (例如，\ 0 ) Single null char (such as, \0 )|NullNull| ||布尔值。Boolean. 在 JSON 中表示为 `true` 或 `false`Represented in JSON as `true` or `false`| |`null``null`) (对象引用和 值类型。`null` (`null` object references and value types).|字符串值为 nullA string value of null| ||字符串值为 nullA string value of null| |基元数值 (或与数字兼容的) 类型： 、、、、、、、、 和 。Primitive numeric (or numeric-compatible) types: , , , , , , , , , and . 使用区域性固定字符串表示形式。The culture-invariant string representation is used.|NumberNumber| ||Date 对象，以 JSON 形式表示， \\ (刻度) \\ /"。Date object, represented in JSON as "\\/Date(number of ticks)\\/". 计时周期数是一个正值或负长的值，它指示自 1970 UTC 年1月1日午夜起经过的计时周期数 (毫秒) 。The number of ticks is a positive or negative long value that indicates the number of ticks (milliseconds) that have elapsed since midnight 01 January, 1970 UTC.

支持的最大日期值为 (12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) 并且支持的最小日期值 (1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM) 。The maximum supported date value is (12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) and the minimum supported date value is (1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM).| |整数类型的枚举Enumerations of integer type|枚举值的整数等效项Integer equivalent of the enumeration value| |实现 或 也不是或的实现的类型 。Types that implement or that are not also implementations of or . 这包括诸如 、和的类型 。This includes types such as , , and .|使用 JSON 数组语法的数组Array that uses JSON array syntax| |实现或的 类型 。Types that implement or . 这包括诸如和之类的类型 。This includes types such as and .|使用 JSON 字典语法的 JavaScript 对象JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax| |自定义具体 (具有具有 get 访问器或公共实例字段的公共实例属性的非抽象) 类型。Custom concrete (non-abstract) types that have public instance properties that have get accessors or public instance fields.

请注意，在这些类型中，公共只写属性、标记有的公共属性或公共字段属性 以及这些类型的公共索引属性都将被忽略。Note that public write-only properties, public property or public field attributes marked with , and public indexed properties in these types are ignored.|使用 JSON 字典语法的 JavaScript 对象。JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax. 包含一个名为 "__type" 的特殊元数据属性，以确保反序列化正确。A special metadata property named "__type" is included to ensure correct deserialization. 请确保公共实例属性具有 get 和 set 访问器，以确保反序列化正确。Make sure that public instance properties have get and set accessors to ensure correct deserialization.| ||GUID 的字符串表示形式String representation of a GUID| ||返回值的字符串表示形式 String representation of the return value of | ## Examples 第一个示例简单阐释了如何序列化和反序列化数据对象。The first example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. 它需要一个名为 Person 的类，如下所示。It requires a class named Person which is shown below. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)] 下一个示例演示一个更复杂的、完整的项目，该项目使用 类来保存和还原对象的状态（使用 JSON 序列化）。The next example shows a more complicated and complete project that uses the class to save and restore the state of an object by using JSON serialization. 此代码使用为类提供的自定义转换器 。This code uses a custom converter that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 初始化不具有类型解析程序的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has no type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不带类型解析程序的类的实例不包括序列化的 JSON 字符串中名为 "__type" ) (类型元数据属性。An instance of the class without a type resolver does not include type metadata properties (named "__type") in the serialized JSON string. 类型元数据属性由 和 方法用于确定 JSON 字符串将转换为的适当托管类型。A type metadata property is used by the and methods to determine the appropriate managed type to which the JSON string will be converted. 有关类型解析程序的信息，请参见 类。For information about type resolvers, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public JavaScriptSerializer (System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver) cil managed
Public Sub New (resolver As JavaScriptTypeResolver)
public: JavaScriptSerializer(System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptTypeResolver ^ resolver);
new System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer : System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver -> System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer

param.name: resolver
param.span: 自定义类型解析程序对象。

span.span: The custom type-resolver object.

summary.span: 初始化具有自定义类型解析程序的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a custom type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化对象时， 类使用 `resolver` 参数来确定要包含在类型元数据属性的序列化 JSON 字符串中的相应值 ( "__type" ) 。When it is serializing an object, the class uses the `resolver` parameter to determine the appropriate value to include in the serialized JSON string for the type metadata property ("__type"). 同样，当 类反序列化 JSON 字符串时，它会使用解析器实例将类型元数据属性值解析为适当的托管类型。Similarly, when the class is deserializing a JSON string, it resolves the type metadata property value to the appropriate managed type by using the resolver instance. 您可以将 `resolver` 参数设置为 `null` ，这等效于调用 构造函数。You can set the `resolver` parameter to `null`, which is equivalent to calling the constructor. 用于 从客户端脚本中调用 Web 服务的异步通信层使用特殊类型解析程序的实例。The instance of that is used by the asynchronous communication layer for invoking Web services from client script uses a special type resolver. 此类型解析程序将可以反序列化的类型限制为在 Web 服务的方法签名中定义的类型或已应用的类型 。This type resolver restricts the types that can be deserialized to those defined in the Web service's method signature, or the ones that have the applied. 无法以编程方式修改此内置类型解析程序。You cannot modify this built-in type resolver programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用通过自定义类型解析器初始化的此对象的实例可能会带来安全风险。Using an instance of this object initialized with a custom type-resolver can present a security risk. 仅将此对象与受信任的数据一起使用。Use this object only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertToType (object obj, Type targetType);
.method public hidebysig instance object ConvertToType(object obj, class System.Type targetType) cil managed
Public Function ConvertToType (obj As Object, targetType As Type) As Object
public: System::Object ^ ConvertToType(System::Object ^ obj, Type ^ targetType);
member this.ConvertToType : obj * Type -> obj

span.span: The object to convert.
The type to convert the object to.

summary.span: 将指定的对象转换成指定的类型。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the specified type.

returns.span: 序列化的 JSON 字符串。

span.span: The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 实例序列化自定义转换器注册到的类型时，序列化程序将调用 方法以获取将转换为 JSON 格式字符串的名称/值对的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON-formatted string. 如果对象图太复杂，或的已注册实例 导致了转换器递归，则方法也可能引发异常。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion.

exception.span: 所生成的 JSON 格式字符串超出了 的值。

span.span: The resulting JSON-formatted string exceeds the value of .
-or-
contains a circular reference.

exception.span: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: 超出了由 定义的递归限制。

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.

MemberSignature.Value: public T ConvertToType<T> (object obj);
.method public hidebysig instance !!T ConvertToType<T>(object obj) cil managed
Public Function ConvertToType(Of T) (obj As Object) As T
member this.ConvertToType : obj -> 'T

span.span: The type to which will be converted.
The object to convert.

summary.span: 将给定对象转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts the given object to the specified type.

returns.span: 已转换成目标类型的对象。

span.span: The object that has been converted to the target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法尝试将由表示的对象实例转换 `obj` 为类型的实例 `T` 。The method tries to convert the object instance that is represented by `obj` to an instance of type `T`. 在此转换过程中，不能保证保留对象引用相等性。During this conversion there is no guarantee that object reference equality is maintained. 因此，您不能假定 `obj` 和 `T` 引用相同的对象。Therefore, you cannot assume that `obj` and `T` refer to the same object. 如果实现从派生的类，则应使用 。 is intended to be used if you implement a class that derives from . 转换器代码必须能够获取序列化程序传递给它的字典中的值，然后将该值转换为类型的实例 `T` 。Converter code must be able to take a value that is in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value to an instance of type `T`. 你可以从转换器代码调用方法，而不是重新实现自定义转换代码来执行此任务 。Instead of re-implementing the custom conversion code to perform this task, you can call the method from the converter code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法 从传递给转换器的字典中的值获取对象。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain a object from a value in the dictionary that is passed to the converter. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此反序列化方法不会尝试将对象图的根强制转换为特定类型，方法与方法相同 。This deserialization method does not try to cast the root of the object graph to a specific type, the way that the method does.

span.span: The type of the resulting object.

param.name: input
param.span: 要进行反序列化的 JSON 字符串。

span.span: The JSON string to be deserialized.

summary.span: 将指定的 JSON 字符串转换为 类型的对象。

span.span: Converts the specified JSON string to an object of type .
The deserialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于首先使用 方法获取对象图，然后尝试将结果强制转换为类型 `T` 。The method is equivalent to first using the method to obtain an object graph and then trying to cast the result to type `T`. 在反序列化过程中，将引用序列化程序的当前类型解析程序，它确定在转换嵌套在数组和字典类型中的元素时要使用的托管类型。During deserialization, the serializer's current type resolver is referenced, which determines the managed type to use when converting elements that are nested inside arrays and dictionary types. 因此，反序列化进程将循环访问的所有嵌套元素 `input` 。As a result, the deserialization process iterates through all nested elements of `input`. 有关类型解析程序的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information about type resolvers, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例提供了如何序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单阐释。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要名为的类 `Person` ，如下面的示例中所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与方法一样，此反序列化方法不会尝试将对象图的根强制转换为特定类型 。This deserialization method does not try to cast the root of the object graph to a specific type, as with the method.

exception.span: 包含指示自定义类型的“__type”属性，但是当前与序列化程序关联的类型解析程序找不到相应的托管类型。

span.span: contains a "__type" property that indicates either or a non-instantiable type (for example, an abstract type or an interface).

exception.span: 尝试将 JSON 数组转换为类似数组的托管类型，该类型不可用作 JSON 反序列化目标。

span.span: An attempt was made to convert a JSON array to an array-like managed type that is not supported for use as a JSON deserialization target.
-or-

exception.span: 不能将 转换为目标类型。

span.span: It is not possible to convert to the target type.

summary.span: 获取或设置 类接受的 JSON 字符串的最大长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of JSON strings that are accepted by the class.

value.span: JSON 字符串的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of JSON strings.

value.span: 默认长度为 2097152 个字符，等同于 4 MB 的 Unicode 字符串数据。

span.span: The default is 2097152 characters, which is equivalent to 4 MB of Unicode string data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当显式创建类的实例时，属性的值才适用 。The value of the property applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用 `jsonSerialization` 配置文件的元素设置异步通信层使用的内部序列化程序实例的最大长度。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the maximum length for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 有关序列化的配置元素的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 Microsoft Ajax 中配置 ASP.NET 服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb763183(v=vs.100))。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb763183(v=vs.100)).

exception.span: 该属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于约束要处理的对象级别的数量的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit for constraining the number of object levels to process.
The number of object levels.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指的是 在以下情况下将处理的对象层次结构中的级别数：The property refers to the number of levels in the object hierarchy that will process in the following cases: - 类反序列化 JSON 字符串。When the class is deserializing a JSON string. - 当 类在序列化过程中遍历对象图时。When the class is walking an object graph during serialization. 仅当显式创建类的实例时，的值才适用 。The value of applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用 `jsonSerialization` 配置文件的元素，为异步通信层使用的内部序列化程序实例设置要处理的对象级别数。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the number of object levels to process for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 有关序列化的配置元素的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 Microsoft Ajax 中配置 ASP.NET 服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb763183(v=vs.100))。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb763183(v=vs.100)).

exception.span: 该属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterConverters (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> converters);
.method public hidebysig instance void RegisterConverters(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> converters) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterConverters (converters As IEnumerable(Of JavaScriptConverter))
public: void RegisterConverters(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptConverter ^> ^ converters);
member this.RegisterConverters : seq<System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> -> unit

param.name: converters
param.span: 包含要注册的自定义转换器的数组。

span.span: An array that contains the custom converters to be registered.

summary.span: 使用 实例注册自定义转换器。

span.span: Registers a custom converter with the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过使用方法将一个或多个自定义转换器注册到一个 实例 。You can register one or more custom converters with a instance by using the method. 注册自定义转换器后，将 使用转换器来序列化托管类型和将 JSON 字符串反序列化为托管类型。When custom converters are registered, uses the converters both to serialize managed types and to deserialize JSON strings to managed types. 可以向同一实例注册多个转换器 ，这些转换器可以指示对同一类型的支持。Multiple converters can be registered with the same instance, and these converters can indicate support for the same type. 因此，为特定类型注册的最后一个转换器是将用于 序列化该类型的。As a result, the last converter that is registered for a specific type is the one that will be used by to serialize the type. 有关自定义转换器的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information about custom converters, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向实例注册自定义转换器 。The following example shows how to register a custom converter with a instance. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: The object to serialize.

summary.span: 将对象转换为 JSON 字符串。

span.span: Converts an object to a JSON string.

returns.span: 序列化的 JSON 字符串。

span.span: The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 实例序列化自定义转换器注册到的类型时，序列化程序将调用 方法以获取将转换为 JSON 字符串的名称/值对的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON string. 如果对象图太复杂，或的已注册实例 导致了转换器递归，则方法也可能引发异常。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion. ## Examples 下面的示例提供了如何序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单阐释。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要名为的类 `Person` ，如下面的示例中所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

contains a circular reference.

exception.span: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: 超出了由 定义的递归限制。

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.
